name: Apod
tagline: View the Astronomy Picture Of The Day (APOD) on your Android device
body:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- APOD--
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project is an Android client to visualize the Astronomy Picture Of The Day (APOD) published by NASA at http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/. This project is free of charges and have been developed with the objective to learn Android programming.

You will find the latest version of this code at the following address:
http://github.com/pchretien

You will find additional information on my blog at:
http://www.basbrun.com

You can contact me at the following email address:
philippe.chretien at gmail.com

Thank you,

Philippe Chr√©tien
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
